item.title: Kate Middleton Unexpectedly Pulls Out of Royal Ascot
item.description: The princess canceled plans to attend the horse racing event on Wednesday as she tries to find the “right balance” in her recovery from cancer, Kensin...

item.title: Trump Quizzes Workers at the White House: ‘Any Illegal Immigrants?’
item.description: President Trump decided to check the immigration status of a work crew installing a new flagpole at the White House.

item.title: How Dr. Phil and a Top Adams Aide Helped Ease ICE’s Path Into New York
item.description: Kaz Daughtry, a freewheeling deputy mayor, has emerged as a crucial ally for the Trump administration and its border czar. So has Dr. Phil.

item.title: Trump Might Get Us Into Another War. Where’s Congress?
item.description: It’s time for the legislative branch to step up.

item.title: If Trump Joins Israel-Iran Conflict, U.S. Troops in Mideast Could Be Vulnerable
item.description: Iran’s leader vowed that his country would respond to any U.S. involvement in the war with Israel.
